Details: Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.

2 AP, 3 essence spells. 3 tile range, 1 tile radius, half effect on miss. Provoke an attack of opportunity when used. Pick ingredient type. At least half rounded down of brews known must be from that recipe list.

You have advantage on all skill checks made as part of the Activate action. When you use the Activate action, you may choose to gain the benefit of the Brew action (without spending any extra AP or essence) instead of using a consumable.
Whenever you use the Devise downtime activity, if your result was 15 or better, also gain the benefit of the Invent downtime activity.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.
Gain the metamagic associated with your subclass.
Whenever you gain a Resolve, gain the benefit of the Prepare downtime activity. You must select Anima, Fontcraft or Tinkering.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.
Whenever you complete a rest in an area with a danger level of 2 or higher, gain the benefits of the Harvest downtime activity.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Gain a new combat feat and a new exploration feat.
Gain a subclass specific effect whenever you use the Activate action.
